thread.title: Golfstream Shares Free Itinerary BuilderTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Golfstream Shares Free Itinerary BuilderTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Golfstream Shares Free Itinerary Builder  
One of my greatest challenges as an emerging company was to meet the clients demand for quality itineraries on a quick turnaround, usually less than 48hours depending on the client. Another marketing challenge can also be making itineraries from scratch.
In my research on the technologies available I was very privileged to come across, an emerging company itself that is focusing on a high technology low cost product for itinerary creation.
Travefy is free and very intuitive with many great features, as its free I do not need to extol the virtues at length, I believe 30 mins of your time to try the program will make you a believer. On behalf of IAGTO members I have negotiated a 10% reduction for the paid travel agent version of Travefy, this version is very much in reach of the smaller company and allows for Logo and price to be shown. Simply use the promotion code BILL10 when you sign up for a 10% discount.
Source:- IAGTO
